00011 CatObsActionTransform::CatObsActionTransform(Controller* controller,
00012                                              size_t numRows, // = obs_dim,
00013                                              size_t numCols,
00014                                              size_t agents,
00015                                              size_t actionDim,
00016                                              size_t actions
00017                                              ) : 
00018     TransformController(controller) {
00019 
00020     // Only one column is expected.
00021     assert(numCols==1);
00022 
00023     this->numRows = numRows;
00024     this->numCols = numCols;
00025     this->agents = agents;
00026     this->actionDim = actionDim;
00027     
00028     obsAction.init(numRows+actionDim,
00029                    numCols,
00030                    agents,
00031                    actions
00032                    );
00033 
00034     prevAction.resize(actionDim);
00035     prevAction.clear();
00036 }

00039 void CatObsActionTransform::getAction(Observation& obs, Vector& action, bool computeGrad) {
00040     
00041     // This observation window code can't handle multi-agent obs.
00042     assert(obs.getAgent() == 0);
00043     obsAction = obs;
00044 
00045     // Copy observations
00046     project( obsAction.getFeatures(),
00047              range(0, numRows),
00048              range(0, 1) )
00049         = project( obs.getFeatures(),
00050                    range(0, numRows),
00051                    range(0, 1) );
00052 
00053     // Append most recent obsAction.
00054     for (size_t i=0; i<actionDim; i++)
00055         (obsAction.getFeatures())(numRows+i, 0) = floor(prevAction(i));
00056     //cerr<<"CatObsAction="<<obsAction.features<<endl;
00057 
00058     try {
00059         controller->getAction(obsAction, action, computeGrad);
00060     } catch (std::exception& e) {
00061         cout<<"obsAction: "<<obsAction.getFeatures()<<endl;
00062         throw e;
00063     }
00064 
00065     prevAction.assign(action);
00066 
00067     //cerr<<"act="<<action<<endl;
00068     
00069 }
00070 }
